content: half_double_crochet textured ear warmer by carolyn calderon this ear warmer headband has a nice combination of front loop and back loop stitches to make the pretty fabric the lines and ridges adds to the beauty of the design pattern comes in three sizes easy to customize the fit you can substitute most #4 medium worsted weight yarns makes a wonderful gift just in time to keep those ears warm includes written instructions in us terminology please see pattern website for details and video tutorials thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
